text: The Grizzly Giant is a giant sequoia in Yosemite National Park's Mariposa Grove. It has a volume of , which makes it the 26th largest living giant sequoia. The Grizzly Giant is the oldest sequoia in the Mariposa Grove, the largest giant sequoia grove in Yosemite National Park. At one time, the Grizzly Giant was considered the oldest and largest tree in the world. ==References== Category:Trees
title: Grizzly Giant
